Notable Matters

2017

  • Silica Magazine Issue 2 crowdfunded, released & distributed ($3K+ raised)
  • Art/Design work featured on the ello.co frontpage (100K+ views)
  • Pale Sea Creatures Tumblr blog makes a viral splash (50k+ notes)
  • Decker Design site for bsfllp.com wins Web Design Award (Graphic Design USA)

2016

  • ‘Pro Pokémon Go Trainer’ publicity stunt goes viral (10M+ views)
  • Silica Magazine launched & issue 1 debuted (300K+ hits)
  • Art/Design work featured on newhive.com (1.8K views)
  • Commissioned for Electric Object's Art Club (52K+ hours view time)

2015

  • Contributed design for Bruce Smear mix feature for DIS Magazine (22K+ listens)
  • Quoted on The New Shelton wet/dry art blog (tweet)
  • Graduated from MFA Design+Technology at Parsons School of Design (GPA 3.7)
